trans-unit.source: Delete a template deployment
trans-unit.target: Delete a template deployment

trans-unit.source: Delete a template deployment.
trans-unit.target: Delete a template deployment.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="953bb73d-e38c-4c29-bd35-1b2d5b37c5ce#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to template deployments.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="953bb73d-e38c-4c29-bd35-1b2d5b37c5ce#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to template deployments.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: DELETE
trans-unit.target: DELETE

trans-unit.source: Replace {resource-group-name} with the name of the resource group in which the resources are deployed.
trans-unit.target: Replace {resource-group-name} with the name of the resource group in which the resources are deployed.

trans-unit.source: Replace {deployment-name} with the name of the template deployment to delete.
trans-unit.target: Replace {deployment-name} with the name of the template deployment to delete.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: Status code: 202
trans-unit.target: Status code: 202

trans-unit.source: This is an asynchronous operation that returns a status of 202 until all resources and the template deployment is successfully deleted.
trans-unit.target: This is an asynchronous operation that returns a status of 202 until all resources and the template deployment is successfully deleted.

trans-unit.source: The <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> response header contains the URI that is used to obtain the status of the process.
trans-unit.target: The <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> response header contains the URI that is used to obtain the status of the process.

trans-unit.source: While the process is running, a call to the URI in the Location header returns a status of 202.
trans-unit.target: While the process is running, a call to the URI in the Location header returns a status of 202.

trans-unit.source: When the process finishes, the URI in the <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> header returns a status of 200 on success.
trans-unit.target: When the process finishes, the URI in the <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> header returns a status of 200 on success.

trans-unit.source: If the asynchronous request failed, the URI in the <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> header returns an error-level status code.
trans-unit.target: If the asynchronous request failed, the URI in the <parameterReference>Location</parameterReference> header returns an error-level status code.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
trans-unit.target: Remarks

trans-unit.source: A template deployment that is currently running cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: A template deployment that is currently running cannot be deleted.

trans-unit.source: Deleting a template deployment removes the associated deployment operations.
trans-unit.target: Deleting a template deployment removes the associated deployment operations.

trans-unit.source: Deleting a template deployment does not affect the state of the resource group.
trans-unit.target: Deleting a template deployment does not affect the state of the resource group.
